messages.subject: Re:computer obsession
messages.msgSnippet: I overheard part of a conversation today about grown men spending hous at the computer, loving it, and getting paid!  Sorry I hadn t read your post first or I
messages.messageBody:
I overheard part of a conversation today about grown men spending hous at
the computer, loving it, and getting paid! Sorry I hadn't read your post
first or I would have paid more attention to who was paying them
Mary Ellen
Neglect Not The Gift That Is In Thee


>>>Her son, 13,
stays home by himself. Although they consider themselves unschoolers,
she
leaves him a list of things to do ("school"work and housework) and he's
fine
with that. Inevitably, though, he spends hours and hours on the
computer.
___________________________________________________________________
